content.prompt: The sides and diagonal of the rectangle above are strictly increasing with time. At the instant when x=4 and y=3 , and d x d t = d z d t MathType@MTEF@5@5@@424F@ and d y d t = k d z d t MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4340@ . What is the value of k at that instant?

choices.label: It cannot be determined from the information given.

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
